divs: Sighting DetailsBlack Triangle was hovering over treetops. It had 3 lights, and absolutely no noise. The exact location of Shelton Elementary school and Cedercrest Rd. We stopped in the middle of the road, because it was unlike anything we've ever seen. We watched it for about 30 seconds and rolled the windows down in the car. No Noise, no movement from the craft. The situation was odd and we decided to leave promptly because we were nearly(70yrds away) directly under it. I regret not taking photos, but I didn't have a camera.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Acworth
There were no other sightings in Acworth on or around February 28th 2001
Summary: Black Triangle hovering 20 feet over treetops
